attributes.action: Leave the A1 trunk road near Morpeth as it is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been calls to dual the A1 between Berwick upon Tweed and Morpeth in Northumberland. I believe this is completely unneccesary as most of the time there is not enough traffic to justify a dual carriageway in this area. The only result would be to destroy even more local countryside.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
